title: Customized Learning Path
content: Every lesson is tailored to your goals and skill level—whether you’re picking up a guitar for the first time or refining advanced techniques, you’ll follow a clear, personalized roadmap.

title: Proven Track Record
content: I’ve guided over 200 students to musical milestones—from mastering barre chords in weeks to writing their first original song—so you know you’re in capable hands.

title: Flexible & Convenient
content: Choose between in-person or online sessions, select your ideal lesson frequency, and access custom practice materials and clips whenever you need them.

title: Passionate Mentorship
content: Music is my lifelong passion. I’m dedicated not just to teaching notes and techniques but to inspiring confidence, creativity, and a love for playing that lasts a lifetime.
